column52:
Through listening to the audio tapes and watching the defamation trial between Johnny Depp and Amber Heard, it's clear she is an abusive, narcissistic & manipulative person who seemingly will stop at nothing to destroy Johnny Depp's career & life. 

She does not deserve the role in Aquaman 2 and over 4 million people have signed a petition to have her removed from the film. 

I for one will not watch the movie if she has even 10 minutes in the film. Nor will I buy L'Oreal products is she is their spokesperson!

She has shown no solid evidence of her being abused by Johnny Depp and all the evidence indicates that she herself was the instigator & abusive person in the relationship. In her own words, she severed his finger, while doctors and nurses said she needed to be admitted for 24 hours in order to keep Johnny Depp safe. She admitted to hitting him, she's heard belittling & screaming at him as he tried numerous times to get away. She's wasted the courts time (not to mention done a real disservice to people that have actually experienced domestic violence who will now have to fight even harder to be taken seriously), & her lies have had a direct and serious impact on the spouse she abused. 

Sign this petition to have her recast. Whether she win or lose this case, she has shown her true colours to the world. Do not support her career aspirations. 

Johnny Depp lost his roles in Pirates of the Caribbean franchise, and in Fantastic Beasts. She should not be allowed to continue to succeed in Hollywood either.
